alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 4:34PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marin and San Francisco Counties through 500 PM PST... At 433 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Francisco, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Mill Valley, Tiburon, Sausalito, Tamalpais-Homestead, Strawberry, Muir Beach, Tamalpais-Homestead Valley and Belvedere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco
